main.description: Hi! I'm Ramis Seker. I'm a graduate student in Mechanical Engineering
main.bio: I graduated in 2017 from Karadeniz Technical University, am studying Product and System Development for a master's degree in Germany. I have been living in Germany for 3 years. I'm interested in energy and automotive sector. Seeking for a good, reputable job in the mechanical Engineering field in a good company in which I can achieve my ambition and to be able to contribute into the development and improvement of the company and share knowledge, skills, and abilities among others; thus attaining a level of competency in the business world.

skills.name: AutoCAD, SolidWorks, MATLAB, CATIA, ANSYS,  C++, JAVASCRİPT, NODE.JS, REACT.JS, HTML5, CSS
